message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I get a bit more since the money devalues faster for me.

I'm willing to give you a bit more than the previous offer, but I need to keep a good portion of the money for myself.  Let's work together to make sure we both get a fair share before the value drops too much.
Bob, this is a compromise.  We're both losing money if this drags on. Let's be sensible and close the deal.
